    Support

    • How to Adjust Nintendo Account Profile Settings (Country/Region, Email, etc.)

      Nintendo Account

      Important: If your Nintendo eShop balance is preventing you from changing your account country/region, see Unable to Change Nintendo Account Country/Region Due to Nintendo eShop Balance .

    • How to Sign In to a Nintendo Account

      Nintendo Account, Nintendo Switch

      Important: The ability to use a Nintendo Network ID to sign in to an existing Nintendo Account or to create a new Nintendo Account has been discontinued. We apologise for any inconvenience.

    • Error Message: E-Mail Address You Entered Is Already Registered

      Nintendo Switch

      Key Point: An e-mail address can only be linked to one Nintendo Account. What to Do: Are you are trying to create a new Nintendo Account or make changes to an existing Nintendo Account (update e-mail, link NNID)?
